data.title: Bilingual Elementary 2nd Grade Teacher -Eastlawn Elementary - Rantoul City Schools #137
data.meta_description:
Rantoul City Schools District 137 is hiring  a 2nd  Grade Bilingual Teacher beginning with the 2023-24 school year at out Eastawn Elementary School. Why choose RCS? Here are four reasons, just to get started... Our Students. Once you meet them, you will love them!
Small Clas
data.text:
Rantoul City Schools #137 permits you to receive a salary advance of up to $2,500 on your initial yearâ€™s annual salary after Board of Education hiring approval. This one-time opportunity is intended so that you may establish yourself in the community and take care of up-front major expenses like moving, apartment rental, damage deposit, or other immediate needs.

Under the direction of the Building Principal/Director of Special Services/Director of Curriculum, the Grade Level Teacher will plan and provide for appropriate learning experiences for students.

General Qualifications:
